name: Nobody Paradox
description: Arthur, one of the engineers that aboard the ANA cargo ship comes out of his cryogenic sleep ahead of schedule and finds himself in midst chaos! Sirens blaring, robots and automatic weapons are charging and firing at him constantly, the ship being hit externally from all sides and coming apart with each impact. Alex needs to eat, drink and get ammo to defend himself with only one type of weapon! But what happened!? Why was he the only one to wake up? He must find his way to the Command Center to solve this mystery! Nobody Paradox is a single player, Sci-fi themed FPS set in the dark environment of a spaceship, filled with explosions, shooting, survival horror and many challenges.
